# PyTextPrinter Python Library Project

This is a Python library project for text printing utilities.

## Project Status

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

## Development Guidelines

- This is a Python library project using standard packaging practices
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Include comprehensive tests using pytest
- Maintain proper documentation with docstrings
- Use semantic versioning for releases
